name: Desk Tour
description: Platform to share your desk and the products you use on it.
lessons: You gotta really be interested in whatever you work on. Otherwise, you will not care enough to work on it when things get inevitably hard. At the end of the day, I didn't care enough about finding the best desk products to continue development... Might revisit this in due time.

name: What time today?
description: Tool to summarize your time availability in seconds.
lessons: Deploy and get your solution in front of people asap. Solving your own problems is almost cheating. Keep dev cycles as short as humanly possible.
results: HN front page, 6000+ visits in first day, ~60 monthly visits, ~80 Google Calendar users.

name: Artificial Art
description: GAN image synthesis for landscape art.
lessons: Research is a whole different beast. To get SOTA, first replicate results. ML is even more frustrating than I previously experienced.
results: A good grade in the class, and some crappy images.

name: DynaML
lessons: Again, hackathons are still full of BS.
results: 4th place at HackRice. 1st place for Facebook Algorithmic Complexity Challenge.

name: FTWL Website
description: Website for a Houston non-profit, Friends of Texas Wildlife.
lessons: Again, keep feedback loops tight - crazy how much this can make/break a project.

name: News Sentiment
description: An attempt to extract company stock correlated sentiment from news articles.
lessons: It's exhausting to build stuff that isn't useful.

name: Rackr
description: A receipt scanning and personal finance tracking iOS app.
results: 1st place at the Capital One Software Engineering Summit

name: Hedwig
description: An on-campus food delivery platform for Rice.

name: SER Jobs
description: Revamp SER Houston's digital application process.

name: LA Bike-Share Data Analysis
description: Analysis and visualization of LA bike-share data.
results: Able to attend the Capital One Engineering Summit.
lessons: Use pandas. If many people use something, it's likely for a reason.

name: News Visualization
description: A network of political figures mentioned in news articles.

name: RiceSlang
description: A Slackbot to explain popular Rice slang terms.
